content: अतिसर्जनं {@--1@} Giving, granting; consigning; विधुरां ज्वलनातिसर्जनात् <ls>Ku. 4. 32</ls>, consigning to the flames; दीयतामिति वचोतिसर्जने <ls>Śi. 14. 48</ls>; तत्तदीयविशिखातिसर्जनात् <ls>Ki. 13. 57</ls> giving back. {@--2@} Liberality, munificence. {@--3@} Killing. {@--4@} Deception. {@--5@} Separation from, parting with.
